hymn.title: We would love the Lord our God
hymn.chords: | G7 - - | C - G7 | C - G7/D | C/E - Am | G/B - G7 | C - G/B | Am - C/E | F - G7 | C - C7/E | F - F/C | Fm - - | C/G - Am | G/B - G7 | C - C7/E | F - Dm | G - G7 | C - - |

layout.singingstanza: We would love the Lord our God With our heart! With our whole heart! Love our God with all our soul, With our soul, love the Lord! Love our God with all our mind— All we think and all we know. Love our God with all our strength! Love the Lord! Love the Lord!

lyrics.stanza: We would love the Lord our God With our heart! With our whole heart! Love our God with all our soul, With our soul, love the Lord! Love our God with all our mind— All we think and all we know. Love our God with all our strength! Love the Lord! Love the Lord!
